Sentencas: The interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are usually ferritic stainless steels such as SUS441.
Titulo: Supersonic spray derived Cu-Co oxide coating on SUS441 to protect the metallic interconnect and to increase stability of SOFC cathode

Sentencas: These steels have issues of oxidation and Cr diffusion under the operational high temperatures, which can cause serious deterioration of the cathode performance.
Titulo: Supersonic spray derived Cu-Co oxide coating on SUS441 to protect the metallic interconnect and to increase stability of SOFC cathode

Sentencas: In order to improve the electrode stability and the oxidation re-sistivity, this work deposits Cu-Co oxide coating on SUS441 interconnects via room-temperature supersonic spray using fine CuCo2O4 spinel-based oxide powders synthesized via a combustion process.
Titulo: Supersonic spray derived Cu-Co oxide coating on SUS441 to protect the metallic interconnect and to increase stability of SOFC cathode

Sentencas: The coating can significantly inhibit the growth of chromium oxide scale on the steel surface and increase the interconnect conductivity by a factor of 4.4 in 200-hr oxidation test in air.
Titulo: Supersonic spray derived Cu-Co oxide coating on SUS441 to protect the metallic interconnect and to increase stability of SOFC cathode

Sentencas: The coating effectively prevents Cr diffusion to the cell composed of La0 & sdot;6Sr0 & sdot;4FeO3-delta electrode and La0 & sdot;8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0 & sdot;2O3-delta electrolyte.
Titulo: Supersonic spray derived Cu-Co oxide coating on SUS441 to protect the metallic interconnect and to increase stability of SOFC cathode

Sentencas: As a result, the coating substantially increases the cathode performance by reducing the interfacial polarization resistance and improving the stability in 100-hr test at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Supersonic spray derived Cu-Co oxide coating on SUS441 to protect the metallic interconnect and to increase stability of SOFC cathode

Sentencas: This study demonstrates that this high-performance protective Cu-Co oxide coating has a promising application prospect for SOFC interconnects.
Titulo: Supersonic spray derived Cu-Co oxide coating on SUS441 to protect the metallic interconnect and to increase stability of SOFC cathode
